extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisite     SPAN 261 or SPAN380.
Corequisites     (SPAN301 and SPAN302) or (SPAN303 and SPAN304).

basic.description:
A study of Don Quijote I and a selection of his short theatrical Interludes.  The course will consider the socio-economic and historical context and the literary implications of these works to provide a better understanding of 17th century Spain and the significance Cervantes' works still hold today.
NOTE    Taught in English together with LLCU 330/3.0.  Students concentrating in Spanish submit written assignments, tests and examinations in Spanish.
basic.subject: SPAN
basic.title: Cervantes I: Earlier Works
